
> If you want Quarto to automatically generate a blog listing, it will look for posts in the same folder (`blog/`) and list them chronologically.

---

## Create a blog post

Each post is a separate `.qmd` file in the `blog/` folder. Example:

`blog/my-first-post.qmd`:

```yaml
---
title: "My First Blog Post"
date: 2025-09-16
author: Sofiya Vyshnya
categories: [Research, AI, Personalized Medicine]
tags: [MRI, AI, Cancer]
toc: false
---
